VGMusic.ConfigHelp: Drag and drop playlists onto this window's playlist sections to assign music.

DefaultMusic.Hint: Various options for default music in certain situations
DefaultMusic.Label: Default Music
DefaultMusic.Name: Default Music

SilentCombatMusicMode.Hint: What to do if combat is currently focused on an actor without a combat track
SilentCombatMusicMode.Name: Silent Combat Music Mode

Options.generic: Play a generic combat music (default or scene combat music)
Options.highestPriority: Play music of the actor with highest priority
Options.lastActor: Play combat music of the last actor with one
